description:
COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence relies on a lightweight, soothing texture to increase organic radiance. By penetrating effortlessly into all skin types, this liquid nourishes damaged sections from within, fortifying them. Besides, the core Snail Secretion Filtrate creates a trustworthy shield against all kinds of external threats, promoting elasticity as well as softness. Thus, redness or irritation tends to become less of an issue, as your complexion experiences effective healing. In fact, this option is particularly helpful after breakouts, when acne-prone skin deals with excess sebum.
To the same extent, this essence balances your skin so there are no imbalances in tone/texture. Other than targeting irregularities, in order to protect from environmental aggressions, it enhances the skin moisture barrier. With optimal hydration levels, invigoration takes place, ensuring a polished/refreshing outcome. After each application, you're likely to notice vast and enduring benefits. Finally, the product's cruelty-free nature preserves a mission of natural as well as clean beauty that does not endanger animals.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a few sprays of COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence after cleansing and toning your face with the appropriate products. Smooth it all over your complexion, as evenly as possible. Then, pat the liquid delicately using your hands to facilitate complete absorption. Finish off the treatment with a hydrating day or night creams, to replenish the skin.

description: SVR [B3] Hydra Essence is perfect to, day after day, repair and fortify your skin and keep it hydrated and plumped. Containing Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, this product has anti-inflammatory properties and the ability to reinforce the skin barrier. It helps reduce redness, irritation, and sensitivity. It reduces discomfort and smoothes the skin making this essence suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin. In addition, it is also enriched with two types of Hyaluronic Acid. Due to this, it not only deeply moisturizes the skin but also plumps it up. This unique formula provides long-lasting hydration, and also allows your skin to better receive other active ingredients. It should, therefore, be applied as a pre-serum, after cleansing, and before the serum or moisturizer.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SVR [B3] Hydra Essence onto previously clean and dry skin using a cotton pad or the palm of your hand. Since it prepares the skin to better receive the active ingredients of other skincare products you should use it after cleansing and before your serum or moisturizer.

description: Filorga NCEF-Essence Supreme Multi-Correction Lotion is ideal too, day after day, rejuvenate and revive the complexion and enhance the overall appearance of the skin. Shake Filorga NCEF-Essence Supreme Multi-Correction Lotion before use. Apply onto previously clean and dry skin using a cotton pad or the palm of your hand and do not rinse. description:
Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Intensive Essence is a gentle and smooth gel essence specifically indicated for skin that suffers from signs of age, dehydration and tired-looking skin. In this way, this solution helps to care for the skin at the internal levels of the epidermis and at the cellular level. Thus, this essence has properties that regenerate the skin, smooth wrinkles and fine lines, firm and intensely hydrate. Furthermore, with continued use, this product helps to lessen the appearance of acne scars and minor blemishes. On the other hand, this essence contains anti-inflammatory properties, it also helps to heal active breakouts and prevent them from happening.

how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Intensive Essence to your clean, dry skin on your face and neck. Gently pat the product until absorbed.

description:
mixsoon Bean Essence 50ml (1.69floz) is a gentle, 2-in-1 exfoliating and hydrating essence that helps smooth unevenly textured skin. It works to moisturize, remove dead skin cells, and revitalize the skin tone, giving your complexion a fresh and youthful glow. This product's formula contains fermented soybean, barley, pomegranate, and Korean pear, which help remove dead skin cells to smooth and soften the skin, improve its hydration, and provide antioxidant benefits. 
Additionally, you can use this essence in two ways. As an exfoliating essence, apply it and gently massage the skin until residue appears, then wipe off with a cotton pad. Otherwise, as a hydrating essence, use daily after any other essences and before moisturizer. So, with regular use, this essence helps reveal a smoother and naturally radiant complexion, ensuring that your skin looks and feels its best.
how_to_use:
How to use
You can use mixsoon Bean Essence 50ml (1.69floz) in two different ways. When using it as an exfoliating essence, use it 2 to 3 times a week, at night, after toner and before any other essences and creams. Gently massage the product on the skin of the face for a few moments until residue rubs off. Then, wipe off the residue with a cotton pad or wash away with water. To use it as a hydrating essence, use it daily, in the morning and evening, after the 3-essence layering process and before moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount to the skin and gently pat it to promote absorption.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits Magic Beauty Shroom Essence Patch x70 (4.05 fl oz) offers unique facial hydration and care. These patches feature an essence with 100% tremella mushroom, known for its exceptional hydrating properties. This key ingredient not only provides intense moisture but also acts as a powerful antioxidant, protecting the skin against external aggressions. Thus, the patches deliver powerful hydration and nourishment while also giving the skin a natural radiance. Easy to use, the product package includes 70 soft pads that are thoroughly soaked in the tremella mushroom essence, alongside a tweezer for convenient application. Furthermore, they are fragrance-free and vegan and suitable for all skin types. Their light but highly hydrating liquid texture provides moisture without stickiness or residue.
Another significant aspect of these essence patches is their versatility. They can function like a normal essence, where you wipe the face with one pad for a refreshing and hydrating experience. Alternatively, they serve as a sheet mask. By applying them to dry patches on the skin and allowing them to sit for about 10 minutes, you can enjoy a more intensive treatment. In summary, this product is a valuable addition to any skincare routine, either as a regular hydrating step or as an intensive mask treatment for dry areas.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Tremella mushroom is rich in polysaccharides, particularly beta-glucans, which are known for their skin-hydrating properties. These compounds help the skin retain moisture, therefore providing intense hydration and leading to plump skin. Additionally, tremella offers antioxidant properties, helping to protect the skin from environmental stressors and oxidative damage.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Chasin' Rabbits Magic Beauty Shroom Essence Patch x70 (4.05 fl oz) to clean skin by sweeping one patch over the entire face. Alternatively, apply the patches on the skin and leave them on for about 10 minutes as a sheet mask.

description:
SKINFOOD Pantothenic Water Parsley Silence Essence 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is a great essence for acne-prone skin. It helps to decrease excess sebum while also hydrating the skin. It also helps to reduce inflammation, which is common with breakouts. This essence contains Hanjae water parsley extract, which is processed by a special method that helps to extract larger amounts of beneficial compounds, maximizing their effects. Water parsley contains pantothenic acid, also known as vitamin B5. This vitamin hydrates the skin and helps to maintain a healthy skin barrier. It also has oil-regulating and soothing effects, so it is beneficial in reducing excess sebum, one of the factors linked to acne. Even more, this product contains a complex of sage, chamomile, and Centella asiatica, further helping to soothe the skin, and salicylic acid, an ingredient known for acting on pores to clear up excess oil and skin cells, targeting blemishes.
 According to one study, after 4 weeks of using this essence, the amount of sebum on the face was reduced by 25%. All in all, this essence helps to regulate excess oil while hydrating and calming inflamed skin, making it ideal for acne-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SKINFOOD Pantothenic Water Parsley Silence Essence 50ml (1.69 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Massage the skin, using circular motions until the product fully absorbs.

description:

In particular, this watery essence is infused with 80% of Ginseng water and a Ginseng complex. Ginseng has been widely used in Korean history because of its unique properties. This ingredient provides moisture and nutrition to the skin, keeping the skin lastingly moisturized and healthy. At the same time, it helps prevent hyperpigmentation and wrinkles caused by UV radiation. In addition, the formula features Niacinamide that not only has sebum-regulating properties but also hydrates the skin. In turn, this will maintain an optimal balance of moisture and oil. Altogether, this essence works to hydrate and nurture the skin.
With a lightweight watery texture, this essence is suitable for all skin types. It's a great ally to include in your skincare routine for quenching thirsty skin and also as a complement for irritated skin by factors such as UV radiation or exfoliation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Pour a few drops of Beauty of Joseon Ginseng Essence Water 150ml (5 fl oz) into your hands and gently pat onto the face, after cleansing. Alternatively, use a cotton pad or reusable alternative to apply the product.

description:
Clarins Extra-Firming Firming Treatment Essence 200ml offers a gentle, liquid texture specially designed to provide smoother, more elastic and firmer facial skin. In particular, this firming youth essence is suitable for all skin types due to the presence of powerful botanical ingredients. In this sense, it intensely hydrates the skin for up to 8 hours while making it more rejuvenated and revitalized by firming it. Moreover, it also prepares the skin so that it can more easily absorb your skincare applied afterward. In the end, it becomes more hydrated, elastic, and even more radiant and fuller.
For all these effects to be more intense, this essence has the presence of Hyaluronic Acid in its formulation. It has the capacity to retain water not only deeply moisturizing the skin but also plumping it up. Furthermore, for extra firming action, Kangaroo flower and Mitracarpus extracts work together to improve the firmness of the skin leaving it also more elastic. Finally, Ginseng helps firm, energize, and hydrate the skin while Jania extract promotes clear skin while enhancing the natural radiance. how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Extra-Firming Firming Treatment Essence 200ml every morning and every night, on clean and makeup-free skin before your usual serum. For this, put a few drops in the palms of your hands. Then, make gentle touches on the face, from the center to the outside, and then on the neck, from top to bottom.

All in all, this lotion is an essential product in every woman's skincare routine that leaves the skin softer, hydrated, and plump.

Flower of Stone is a desert plant with the ability to retain water which makes it a powerful moisturizer. Therefore, it deeply hydrates the skin.

In other words, this serum has a light texture that mixes an essence with concentrated oils that provide a high hydration boost to the skin. At the same time, the skin turns out to be less dull, healthier and equally protected from environmental stressors.
This is only possible thanks to a potent formula rich in antioxidants. In particular, these properties end up strengthening the skin's protective barrier, helping to retain moisture in the skin. Specifically, these ingredients are Prickly Pear Seed Oil, Yerba Mate Leaf, Acai Berry and Camu Camu. In turn, the presence of Glycerin helps to provide enormous hydration to the skin so that it is more radiant than ever. In short, this light and oily serum helps bring back the skin's natural glow while reinforcing its protective barrier and hydrates it deeply.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply 2 to 3 drops of Huxley Oil Essence Essence-like, Oil-like 30ml onto your clean face after toner and gently pat into your skin for optimal absorption. Apply daily, morning and night, and follow with cream.

description:
TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy Essence is an ideal facial serum for really dry and dehydrated skin. It is normal with daily stress or even external aggressions such as pollution that our skin becomes dry and dull. Thus, this fluid serum helps to restore the skin's barrier, leaving it much more hydrated and nourished. In addition, the skin regains its vitality and good appearance. On the other hand, this serum contains a non-greasy and quickly absorbed texture that helps to smooth out wrinkles and fine lines on the face, leaving it more rejuvenated.
For this light and gentle serum to work, it contains a composition with highly nourishing ingredients. In this case it has Safflower Extract and Organic Argan Oil, in addition to Chronoline Peptide and Resurrection Plant Extract. The latter also helps the skin to become firm and less sagging. In short, if you need a fluid serum that really hydrates and nourishes your skin in depth, this product is essential in your skin care routine. It glides easily over the skin without causing any irritation and is quickly absorbed to hydrate for a long time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy Essence to your clean, dry skin. Massage until the product is fully absorbed.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Essence 40ml (1.3 fl oz) is a replenishing and anti-aging formula that delivers countless benefits at the same time. First and foremost, this is an ultra-nourishing product that promises to leave your skin looking plump, smooth and refreshed. By resorting to Fragmented Hyaluronic Acid, this essence instantly replenishes and replumps the complexion, increasing its ability to bind moisture, as well. 
Simultaneously, the Cellular Performance Essence is part of the SENSAI anti-aging basic line. In fact, this composition contains signature ingredients like the Advanced CPX Vital Extract and the Koishimaru Silk EX. These technologies smooth, tighten, strengthen and protect the skin, contributing, therefore, to a lustrous, young-looking, and luminous result. 
Last but not least, the Cellular Performance Essence works as a prepping step that will enhance the performance of the subsequent formulas. The light texture not only penetrates easily the skin but increases the penetration of cream or emulsion.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Essence 40ml (1.3 fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening routine. Apply two to three drops to the skin, after lotion. Then, follow with cream or your favorite emulsion.

description:
SENSAI Ultimate The Emulsion 100ml (3.4 fl oz) is a luxurious and rich emulsion that fights advanced signs of aging while providing the ultimate comforting experience. This formula is part of an anti-aging range that focuses on addressing advanced concerns and damage by reactivating all skin functions. In fact, the Ultimate The Emulsion proves to be efficient in enhancing the complexion's own production of enzymes, hyaluronic, collagen and elastin. Even more, it helps to regulate metabolism and pigment formation. As a result, the skin appears smoother, plumper and overall younger-looking. 
All of these benefits are possible thanks to a high concentration of active agents. The Ultimate The Emulsion blends the benefits of the staple Koishimaru Silk EX technology with the exclusive Sakura Eternal Complex.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Ultimate The Emulsion 100ml (3.4 fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine after the matching lotion.

description:
SENSAI Ultimate The Lotion 125ml (4.2 fl oz) nourishes the skin, revealing its own beautiful glow.
Inspired by the code of etiquette for the ancient Japanese tea ceremony, SENSAI developed a skincare ritual for the ultimate flawless skin. At its core is a Double Moisturizing step with nourishing and gentle products, such as this lotion. Its exceptional formula combines skin-like ingredients with potent Botanical Extracts, one of which is the famed Sakura Tree extract. The result is a truly soft, hydrated, and revitalized complexion, in no small part due to the blend with SENSAI’s unique Koishimaru Silk. This powerful mix also helps soothe and lessen early aging signs, maintaining a soft expression and a youthful complexion.
Part of an almost magical skincare routine, this Lotion is the first step to fully hydrate the skin and release its inner shine. Afterward, the new-found smoothness and radiance will mesmerize and provide a soft and elegant beauty to the face.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing the face, apply a generous amount of SENSAI Ultimate The Lotion 125ml (4.2 fl oz) on the dry face. Massage it until the skin fully absorbed it and then follow up with another emulsion or cream as part of the Saho ritual.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Extra Intensive Essence 40ml (1.3 fl oz) was specially developed to offer fast results to skin in need of a nourishment and energy boost. description:

In fact, with a composition that is simultaneously lifting and draining, this unique product promises to help you achieve more defined and smooth facial contours.  
On one side, the presence of the Micro Mesh Uplifter Technology builds and strengthens the tissue structure from within, contributing, therefore, to volumized and remodeled facial features. description:
Huxley Essence Brightly Ever After 30ml consists of a perfect serum for dull skin with the need for a boost of hydration and radiance. In this way, this highly concentrated serum penetrates easily into the skin leaving it brighter, more uniform and protected from external factors such as pollution. Furthermore, its milky texture does not leave the skin oily or greasy, making it ideal for all skin types.
This is only possible thanks to a formula with protective, soothing and moisturizing properties. In this case we are mainly talking about Prickly Pear Seed Oil, an ingredient rich in soothing properties for the skin. At the same time, it helps to protect the skin barrier so that it is strengthened against polluting agents, which ends up being a cause of dull skin. In turn, Niacinamide helps smooth the skin's complexion while also protecting the skin and moisturizing it. Finally, Glycerin and Squalane help to give a boost of hydration to this serum so that your skin is visibly healthier and radiant. All in all, this lightweight serum leaves any skin type more hydrated, brightened and truly protected against pollutants.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply 2 to 3 drops of Huxley Essence Brightly Ever After 30ml onto your clean face after toner and gently pat into your skin for optimal absorption. Apply daily, morning and night, and follow with cream.

description:
The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke Essence 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a concentrated formula specially developed to instantly restore the skin’s hydration levels. Perfect for skin that is oily on the surface but also dehydrated on the inside, this essence is loaded with moisturizing energy. Moreover, it equally contributes to a firmer complexion with a stronger natural barrier.  
All of these benefits are possible thanks to potent composition with almost no chemical ingredients. In fact, this essence is part of The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke line, a range of products that uses mostly natural components for mild and ultra-hydrating formulas. The main ingredient of this collection is Harakeke, an indigenous plant that only grows in New Zealand. This extract offers three times more hydration than Aloe Vera or Olive Oil and contains many healing agents. Therefore, hand-harvested in a completely eco-friendly way, the Harekeke Extract is able to turn dehydrated skin into a smooth and plump surface.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke Essence 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning and /or evening routine to the skin of your face, after toner. Spread the formula on the skin and, then, lightly pad for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range for optimal results.

100% of Pure Fermented Green Tea contains great antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, UV protectant and skin soothing properties. In addition, it helps to hydrate the skin while protecting it from environmental factors.

To begin with, cleanse and tone the skin. Then, pour a small amount of La Prairie Skin Caviar Essence-in-Lotion onto the hands and massage it. Work the product gently onto the face and neck before applying serum.

description:
COSRX One Step Moisture Up Pads are perfect to hydrate particularly congested skin types. As the day progresses, even dry/sensitive complexions tend to accumulate all sorts of impurities. Thanks to a combination of Propolis Extract and Hyaluronic Acid, these pads increase personal comfort instantly. In fact, their essence provides a refreshing as well as soothing finish.
As their benefits penetrate into your complexion, you’ll experience a boost in nutrients. Moreover, moisture is restored, enhancing the skin’s natural defensive barrier. All in all, this option casts aside dead cells, exfoliating without endangering the epidermis' protective barrier. In other words, this continues to inhibit the spread of harmful free radicals. Finally, it also blocks other threats that may come your way. In the end, you’ll have access to top-level hydration and find the ultimate source of replenishment. Besides, these hypoallergenic pads can also help you correct small makeup mistakes, elevating one's degree of precision.
how_to_use:
How to use
Smooth one or more COSRX One Step Moisture Up Pads throughout your entire face, being careful when approaching the sensitive eye section. Apply little pressure and remember to be as gentle as possible. Use these pads immediately after cleansing, to maximize their effects. Resort to the embossing side first to activate the product’s exfoliating facet. Then, turn the pad over to finish off with the softer side. Finally, make sure you close the packaging adequately to prevent the pads from losing their core, moisturizing essence.
